messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Does anyone know why...
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s his descendant all right. Her name appears to be Hijikata Fumi. One of the other pages also had a female descendant of Satou Hikogorou (Kondou s old
messages.messageBody:
>now...I ~think~ the woman is the same woman I've seen in books and
>other Japanese sites who is a descendent (?) of Hijikata...the
>pictures are of the ceremony acknowledging the anniversary of
>Hijikata's passing.

That's his descendant all right. Her name appears to be Hijikata Fumi. One
of the other pages also had a female descendant of Satou Hikogorou (Kondou's
old buddy), but I couldn't make out her given name.

--M.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Does anyone know why...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/20/2004 8:52:18 PM Eastern Standard Time, bsher213@bellatlantic.net writes: ... We all _know_ it s really just a carp hatched plot to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/20/2004 8:52:18 PM Eastern Standard Time,
bsher213@... writes:


secretary wrote:

>don't you love how I come up with subject lines which attracts
>everyone's attention? LOL!
>

We all _know_ it's really just a carp hatched plot to distract us and
infiltrate our minds.... (yes, I do belong to the conspiracy theory of
the week club --ha!)

>My question is...why is there a pic of those cute chickens? >>
>
Theory 1--Okita had his pig Hijikata had his chickens?

Theory 2---Hijikata was always chasing chicks of the HUMAN* variety
(*that one's for Miss B)

Theory 3---there is no theory 3

Theory 4--- (courtesy of my daughter the quasi-Okita reincarnation) The
Shinsengumi were poor and could only afford chickens for their little
farmyard.

(yes, I also subscribe to the crack-pot theory of the month club)

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net






visit

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ_Spy_Division/

our companion list featuring fanfiction/art
Yahoo! Groups Links



-Sigh- Don't you people remember he was a farm boy?! What kind of farmer
doesn't have chickens?! The family is OBVIOUSLY just reminding him of his
origins so he doesn't get too full of himself in the afterlife with all us fangirls
drooling over him.


-MissBehavin (Grew up on a farm. Doesn't like chickens unless they're fried.
Thinks that's the REAL reason Hijikata advocated the consumption of the nasty
fowls by the Shinsengumi.)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Does anyone know why...
messages.msgSnippet: don t you love how I come up with subject lines which attracts everyone s attention? LOL! Okay...at this link http://www.suzutoo.co.jp/hn200405_top.html are
messages.messageBody:
don't you love how I come up with subject lines which attracts
everyone's attention? LOL!

Okay...at this link
http://www.suzutoo.co.jp/hn200405_top.html
are pics from Hino
now...I ~think~ the woman is the same woman I've seen in books and
other Japanese sites who is a descendent (?) of Hijikata...the
pictures are of the ceremony acknowledging the anniversary of
Hijikata's passing.

My question is...why is there a pic of those cute chickens? I
mean...the even it for Hijikata I'm pretty sure (I've seen the exact
same pics on pages the fish has translated)...and now there are
these...chickens.
There are newspaper articles which you can click to enlarge and read.
